False Appearance.Name: False Appearance
False Appearance.Trait: While <NL> remains motionless, <GL1> is indistinguishable from a mundane, inanimate object.

Magic Resistance.Name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.Trait: <NU> has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Nimble Escape.Name: Nimble Escape
Nimble Escape.Trait: <NU> can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of <GL3> turns.

Sunlight Sensitivity.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.Trait: While in sunlight, <NL> has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
